#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int a[1000005];

int main() {

    /* Enter your code here. Read input from STDIN. Print output to STDOUT */    
    long long int T, len, i, count, power;
    scanf("%lld", &T);
    while(T--){
        char a[55];
        scanf("%s", a);
        len=strlen(a);
        count=0;
        power=1;
        if(len>2){
            for(i=1;i<len-1;i++){
                if(a[i]!=a[i+1] && a[i]!=a[i-1]){
                    count++;
                }
            }
            if(a[0]!=a[1])
                count++;
            if(a[len-1]!=a[len-2])
                count++;
        }
        else{
            if(len==1){
                count=1;
//                printf("ha %lld\n", count);
            }
            if(len==2 && a[0]==a[1])
                count=0;
            else if(len==2 && a[0]!=a[1])
                count=2;
        }
        for(i=0;i<count;i++){
            power=power*2;
        }
        printf("%lld\n", power);
    }
    return 0;
}
